parties: The scenario can be seen as an overshoot of the 3.4 W/m2 level (which it exceeds and then returns to by about 2100) and an overshoot of the 2.6 W/m2 level, which it returns to in the 23rd century.

name: RCP34-extension-overshoot Aerosols
rationale: Representative Concentration Pathway 3.4 extension overshoot, future, scenario, SSP5, RCP3.4 extension overshoot, NTCF, aerosol
longName: Representative Concentration Pathway 3.4 extension Overshoot Aerosols
